amendatorysection.catchline: Permanency review or case review; independence coordinator; duties.
amendatorysection.para: At least thirty days prior to each permanency review or case review, the independence coordinator shall meet with the young adult to notify the young adult of the date, time, and location of the review, to explain the purpose of the review, and to identify additional persons the young adult would like to attend the review and assist in making arrangements for their attendance.
